name: Tumblr dashboard: Darren Criss for People Magazine
description: meu primeiro Tumblr dashboard theme sigam: http://felicidade-sem-motivo.tumblr.com/
css: body {      background: url('http://i.imgur.com/pJVbh.jpg') bottom right fixed no-repeat #7AC5CD  !important;    }      ol#posts li blockquote,   #ffffff blockquote {    margin-left: 0 !important;    margin-right: 0 !important;    padding-left: 10px !important;    border-width: 4px !important;    border-color: #7AC5CD !important;    }    ol#posts li blockquote blockquote,    #ffffff blockquote blockquote {    border-color: #7AC5CD !important;    }    ol#posts li blockquote blockquote blockquote,    #ffffff blockquote blockquote blockquote {    border-color: #ffffff !important;    }    ol#posts li blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote,    #ffffff blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote {    border-color: #7AC5CD !important;    }    ol#posts li blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote,    #ffffff blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote {    border-color: #7AC5CD !important;    }    #dashboard_index #ffffff {      background color: #ffffff; !important;    }    #content {      background: #7AC5CD !important;      -webkit-border-radius: 20px;      -moz-border-radius: 20px;      border-radius: 20px;      margin: auto;      padding: 20px 20px;    }    h1 {  color: #141414;  text-shadow: #ffffff;  }    .no_posts_found, h1.dashboard_header {  color: #7AC5CD;  }    img#content_top, img#content_bottom {  display: none;  }    #right_column a#dashboard_switch_blog_menu_current #dashboard_switch_blog_arrow_current {      background: #ffffff;    }    #right_column .dashboard_nav_item {      background: none repeat-x;      background-attachment: ffffff;      background-position-x: 50%;      background-position-y: 100%;      background-origin: ffffff;      background-clip: ffffff;      background-color: FF0808;  }    #right_column .dashboard_nav_item #hide_radar {  background-image: #ffffff;  background-repeat-x: no-repeat;  background-repeat-y: repeat;  background-attachment: ffffff;  background-position-x: 0%;  background-position-y: 0%;  background-origin: ffffff;  background-clip: ffffff;  background-color: #141414;  }    #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_controls_radar_media.photo, #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_controls_radar_media.photoset, #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_controls_radar_media.video {  background: ffffff;  }    #nav .nav_item.active {      background: FF0808) !important;    }    #nav .nav_item .nav_item_nipple .nav_item_nipple_pixel {      background: ffffff !important;    }    ol#posts li.notification.alt {      background-color: FF0808;  }    ol#posts li.notification.first_notification {      background-color: ffffff);  }    ol#posts li.notification {      background-color: ffffff;      border-bottom: 1px solid #525252;  }    ol#posts li.notification.last_notification {      border-bottom: 1px solid #7AC5CD;  }    ol#posts li.post .permalink {      background: FF0808;  }    #right_column .dashboard_nav_item #dashboard_controls_suggested_blogs {  background: ffffff;  border: solid #ffffff;  }    ol#posts li.post .post_avatar{  border-bottom: 0px solid #7AC5CD;  }    #right_column .dashboard_nav_item #dashboard_controls_suggested_blogs .dashboard_controls_suggested_blog {  border-top: 1px solid #7AC5CD;  border-bottom: 1px solid #7AC5CD;  }    #right_column a#dashboard_switch_blog_menu_current:hover {  background: #ffffff;  }    #right_column a#dashboard_switch_blog_menu_current:hover #dashboard_switch_blog_arrow_current {  background: #ffffff;  }    form.dashboard_options_form {  background-color: FF0808;  border-bottom: 1px solid #7AC5CD;  border-bottom-left-radius: 10px 10px;  border-bottom-left-radius: 10px 10px;  border-bottom-right-radius: 10px 10px;  border-bottom-right-radius: 10px 10px;  border-top-left-radius: 10px 10px;  border-top-left-radius: 10px 10px;  border-top-right-radius: 10px 10px;  border-top-right-radius: 10px 10px;  color: #7AC5CD;  display: block;  font-size: 13px;  margin-bottom: 25px;  padding: 15px 22px;  }    form.dashboard_options_form .option_container {  border-top: 1px solid #7AC5CD;  }    .no_posts_found, h1.dashboard_header {  color: #141414;  }
